main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported over Lathrop Wells, Nevada in August 1952.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a spherical object moving at over 1,000 mph and showing erratic behavior., A second sighting included a bright, self-luminous object that changed color and maneuvered in a zig-zag pattern., Witnesses reported one object as 15-30 feet in diameter and estimated to be 3,000-5,000 feet in altitude., The majority of sightings occurred under clear weather conditions with no known air traffic in the vicinity., No photographic evidence was provided for any of the reported incidents.
sighted object: spherical and luminous objects in the sky
witness description: USAF personnel and Air Force Base witnesses
